subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Since 2007, Mike Hopkins has been the coach-in-waiting at Syracuse — although the 69-year-old Jim Boeheim will be on the Orange sideline for at least one more season.
snippet: Since 2007, Mike Hopkins has been the coach-in-waiting at Syracuse — although the 69-year-old Jim Boeheim will be on the Orange sideline for at least one more season.
